name: Glorious Myrmidon
text: You are a warrior of tremendous athleticism and skill. For you, battle is the ultimate competition—a contest in which your personal triumphs and deeds of daring will win you lasting glory. You measure your victories by the fame and recognition they bring you. Folks might say that you’re proud, vain, or selfish, and that your hubris is an affront to the gods. You see nothing wrong in wanting to glorify the natural gifts the gods granted you or demonstrating to the world the rewards that can be won with courage, dedication, and skill.

features.battleAgility(11thLevel): You ignore the speed penalty and check penalty of chainmail and scale armor
features.myrmidon'sAction(11thLevel): When you spend an action point to take an extra action, you can shift 3 squares as a free action before or after the extra action, and you gain a +2 bonus to attack rolls until the start of your next turn
features.myrmidonAthleticism(16thLevel): You gain a +1 bonus to speed and a +2 bonus to Acrobatics, Athletics, and Endurance checks

flavorText: The gods look upon my moment of glory and know envy.
